医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
Mogrify 任命 Jonathan Appleby 博士为首席科学官随着公司将多个治疗项目推向临床开发并进入临床开发，战略性招聘增强了执行领导团队的实力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Mogrify-appoints-Dr-Jonathan-Appleby-as-Chief-Scientific-Officer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Mogrify-appoints-Dr-Jonathan-Appleby-as-Chief-Scientific-Officer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c400c519-eca1-462d-8bc0-e63e6f744142 Mon, 15 Jul 2024 11:34:00 -0400 Mogrify appoints Dr. Jonathan Appleby as Chief Scientific Officer
全球儿童免疫覆盖率：进展停滞，差距日益扩大根据世界卫生组织 (WHO) 和联合国儿童基金会今天发布的数据，全球儿童免疫接种覆盖率在 2023 年陷入停滞，与 2019 年大流行前的水平相比，新增 270 万儿童未接种疫苗或疫苗接种不足。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Global-childhood-immunization-coverage-Stalled-progress-and-having-gaps.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Global-childhood-immunization-coverage-Stalled-progress-and-forming-gaps.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=95c9d58b-8acd-4b3a-bf59-e84cd226c12a Mon, 15 Jul 2024 11:05:48 -0400 Global childhood immunization coverage: Stalled progress and growing gaps
研究表明，COVID-19 会导致免疫系统的长期变化维也纳医科大学的研究小组最近在著名期刊《过敏》上发表的一项研究表明，即使在轻微病例中，COVID-19也会导致免疫系统发生相当大的长期变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/COVID-19-leads-to-long-term-changes-in-the-immune-system-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/COVID-19-leads-to-long-term-changes-in-the-immune-system-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e9801ddb-1c14-47ef-ae77-ae96e4131c5f Mon, 15 Jul 2024 07:37:00 -0400 COVID-19 leads to long-term changes in the immune system, study shows
加州医疗保健先锋走向全国，为党派小冲突做好准备当当时的政府。阿诺·施瓦辛格 (Arnold Schwarzenegger) 呼吁几乎所有加州人购买健康保险，否则将面临处罚；安东尼·赖特 (Anthony Wright) 抨击 2007 年的提案“毫无根据、不可行且不明智”——该提案将惩罚那些最无力承担保险费用的人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/California-health-care-pioneer-goes-national-girds-for-partisan-skirmishes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/California-health-care-pioneer-goes-national-girds-for-partisan-skirmishes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1affccb6-9543-4cc4-bb59-f3479a0e4b96 Mon, 15 Jul 2024 07:21:43 -0400 California health care pioneer goes national, girds for partisan skirmishes
评估青少年和年轻人增肌补充剂使用情况的新指南《青少年健康杂志》上发表的一篇评论得出的结论是，青少年和年轻人，尤其是男孩和年轻男性，普遍使用增肌膳食补充剂，这是由于坚持肌肉发达和瘦身理想的压力所致。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/New-guidance-for-assessing-muscle-building-supplement-use-in-teens-and-young-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/New-guidance-for-assessing-muscle-building-supplement-use-in-teens-and-young-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0862a660-bb33-4120-9722-4fd1c11703b0 Mon, 15 Jul 2024 07:01:00 -0400 New guidance for assessing muscle-building supplement use in teens and young adults
一次性引物编辑针对囊性纤维化的常见遗传原因研究人员优化了prime编辑，以有效校正人气道上皮细胞中囊性纤维化跨膜电导调节因子F508del突变，实现高校正效率和功能恢复，同时将脱靶效应降至最低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/One-time-prime-editing-targets-common-genic-cause-of-cystic-fibrosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/One-time-prime-editing-targets-common-genic-cause-of-cystic-城纤维化.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=efece251-fd8c-427c-a77a-7301afb5913c Mon, 15 Jul 2024 06:42:00 -0400 One-time prime editing targets common genetic cause of cystic fibrosis
饮酒与女大学生的精神疾病症状显着相关生活方式因素与大学女性精神疾病（MI）之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Alcohol-use-significantly-linked-with-mental-illness-symptoms-in-college-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Alcohol-use-significantly-linked-with-mental-illness-symptoms-in-college-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e6994350-0f0c-47ae-8b79-4fba8f6a80b8 Mon, 15 Jul 2024 06:10:00 -0400 Alcohol use significantly associated with mental illness symptoms in college women
睡眠时间、睡眠时间类型和生活方式会影响认知能力下降研究人员探讨了生活方式和健康状况对认知能力下降的患病率和发生率的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Sleep-duration-chronotype-and-lifestyle-affect-cognitive-decline.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Sleep-duration-chronotype-and-lifestyle-affect-cognitive-decline.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=46fee7e2-4077-45be-8658-d567e010163b Mon, 15 Jul 2024 05:12:00 -0400 Sleep duration, chronotype, and lifestyle affect cognitive decline
研究将改善膳食脂肪质量与降低心血管和糖尿病风险联系起来膳食脂肪质量对脂质代谢的影响及其与降低心脏代谢疾病风险的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Study-links-improved-dietary-fat-quality-to-reduced-cardioangio-and-diabetes-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Study-links-improved-dietary-fat-quality-to-reduced-cardioangio-and-diabetes-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a24027bf-03d5-4da1-a8b0-ec3d55683130 Mon, 15 Jul 2024 05:04:00 -0400 Study links improved dietary fat quality to reduced cardiovascular and diabetes risk
研究发现，社会孤立和孤独的综合影响会降低认知健康社会孤立（SI）和孤独（LON）对六年以上中老年人记忆力的个体和综合影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Combined-impact-of-social-isolation-and-loneiness-found-to-diminish-cognitive-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Combined-impact-of-social-isolation-and-loneiness-found-to-diminish-cognitive-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3807a30a-c786-4b75-90c2-1af4bb657495 Mon, 15 Jul 2024 04:39:00 -0400 Combined impact of social isolation and loneliness found to diminish cognitive health
